verbs.description: The ink [V: was] barely dried on Trump 's pardon of Jack Johnson when Stallone announced a new biopic on the boxing legend .
[ARG1: The ink] was [ARGM-MNR: barely] [V: dried] [C-ARG1: on Trump 's pardon of Jack Johnson] [ARGM-TMP: when Stallone announced a new biopic on the boxing legend] .
The ink was barely dried on Trump 's pardon of Jack Johnson [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: Stallone] [V: announced] [ARG1: a new biopic on the boxing legend] .
